author: Garrey Dawson
method: Place the spring greens in a steamer set over a pan of boiling water and steam for 6-8 minutes, or until tender. Season to taste with salt and freshly ground black pepper and transfer to a serving dish.  Dot the butter over the greens and serve.
ingredients: large handful spring greens, sliced,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  25g/1oz butter
